tasya# tE dadatuq yEShA$M prAqNO&siq svAhA# GRuqtasyaq dhArA#maqmRuta#syaq panthAqmindrE#Na daqttAM praya#tAM maqrudBi#H | 
tat tvAq viShNuqH parya#paSyaqt tat tvEDAq gavyaira#yat || 
pAqvaqmAqnEna# tvAq stOmE#na gAyaqtrasya# vartaqnyOpAq(gm)qSO rvIqryE#Na dEqvastvA# saviqtOth sRu#jatu jIqvAta#vE jIvanaqsyAyai# bRuhad-rathantaqrayO$stvAq stOmE#na triqShTuBO# vartaqnyA Suqkrasya# vIqryE#Na 
dEqvastvA# saviqtOth - [  ]  39
